issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Redundant checkFileProgress() in PART II of getAdditionalBlock()

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
TestDFSClientRetries#testIdempotentAllocateBlockAndClose can illustrate the bug. It failed in the following builds.
- https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/14188/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hdfs/TestDFSClientRetries/testIdempotentAllocateBlockAndClose/
- https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/14201/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hdfs/TestDFSClientRetries/testIdempotentAllocateBlockAndClose/
- https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/14202/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hdfs/TestDFSClientRetries/testIdempotentAllocateBlockAndClose/
fields.summary: ClientProtocol.addBlock is not idempotent after HDFS-8071

comments.body: h9690_20160124b.patch: updates the test; otherwise, it will fail since the mock does not throw RemoteException.

Tried committing, patch doesnt apply to branch-2.7 as there is no FSDirWriteFileOp.java in branch-2.7.

Thanks Vinay for reviewing and trying committing the patch!

I just have committed the patch down to 2.8.  Here is a patch for 2.7.

h9690_20160124b_branch-2.7.patch: for 2.7.

FAILURE: Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #9186 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/9186/])
